attributes.action: Call a general election as soon as possible in order to give the electorate an opportunity to give their verdict on MPs' expenses debacle.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's created the rules governing expenses and many have exploited them.  It has destroyed trust and confidence with the electorate.  How can we trust them to sort the matter out.  Give voters their say.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
